newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Feb 25.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Feb 25.

text.p: These are significant items in the Ivorian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these items and does not vouch for their accuracy. FRATERNITE MATIN - Spain lends Ivory Coast 10 billion CFA francs to equip hospitals and improve health services - Delegation from South Korean company Samsung Corporation discusses four projects with Prime Minister Daniel Kablan Duncan -- extending Ivory Coast's electricity network, extending its oil refinery, a butane gas bottling plant and a television factory LA VOIE - Ivorian dock workers set up new national union saying they want to be free of official interference of any kind; new union SYNALIDOCI launched at meeting attended by around 500 dockers; its president Daniel Zadi Nadje denounces attempts to curb union rights in Abidjan port. - Commerce Minister Nicolas Akon Kouassi tells congress of Ivorian traders union SYNACCI that the government plans to introduce a professional card to help stamp out fraud - West African livestock rearing experts draw up plan to encourage private investment in the sector, which plays importaant role in certain economies in the region LE JOUR - Islamic Development Bank holds seminar to explain how zakat, money gathered from Moslem duty to give alms, can be mobilised for development
